title: Nilamani Kundan Bandi Haaram - A Sapphire and Diamond Necklace
features: Classic Bandi Haaram design featuring meticulously set Kundan Polki diamonds in a floral halo motif. The pendant showcases a rich, deep blue pear-shaped Sapphire held in an intricate gold and diamond bezel setting. The individual Kundan units are linked seamlessly for comfortable wear. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's luster.
occasions: and bridal wear. A statement piece for any special occasion where you want to exude elegance and tradition.
description: This Kundan Bandi Haaram is a fusion of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and contemporary design. The exquisite Sapphire pendant adds a touch of modern glamour to the timeless Kundan setting. Handcrafted by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, this piece is a unique blend of heritage and style. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and a vibrant Sapphire ensures lasting value and enduring beauty.
